hero_subtitle: Empaerial is a community of international students working on UAVs, sharing knowledge and building innovation together.
team_subtitle: A passionate group of students from around the world ‚Äî combining creativity, engineering, and collaboration to build the future of UAVs.
contact_text: Email us at contact@empaerial.com or follow us on social media.

team_coord_desc: Keeping the team organized and projects on track.

vespasian.name: Vespasian
vespasian.summary: Lightweight quadcopter prototype for stable flight and durability.
vespasian.description: Vespasian is a lightweight quadcopter prototype featuring carbon fiber arms and 3D-printed PLA body components, designed for stability, modularity, and precision performance.
